# 1994: Paris

```{python}
from ipyleaflet import Map, Marker, basemap_to_tiles, basemaps

paris = (48.89084843379842, 2.2811505653731032)
m = Map(
    basemap=basemap_to_tiles(basemaps.OpenStreetMap.Mapnik, "1994-09-20"),
    center=paris,
    zoom=11.5,
)
m.add_layer(Marker(location=paris))
m
```

## 1998: France â†’ UK

```{python}
from ipyleaflet import Map, Marker, basemap_to_tiles, basemaps

paris = (48.89084843379842, 2.2811505653731032)
kenilworth = (52.33904807070224, -1.587793512840982)
places = {kenilworth, paris}
m = Map(
    basemap=basemap_to_tiles(basemaps.OpenStreetMap.Mapnik, "1998-07-31"),
    center=(
        sum(coord[0] for coord in places) / len(places),
        sum(coord[1] for coord in places) / len(places),
    ),
    zoom=6,
)
for place in places:
    m.add_layer(Marker(location=place))
m
```
